branchCategory.name: ZA
branchCategory.description: <p>Vacuum Generator series ZA is compact and lightweight, making it ideal for pick and place operations, and suitable to all industries.&nbsp; Due to the compact design of the ZA, it is possible to install on moving parts.&nbsp; The shortened tube length to pad improves response time.&nbsp; The ZA is available as a single unit or manifold type, with or without pressure sensors&nbsp;and suction filters.&nbsp;</p>
